text: Karen Anita Pendleton (August 1, 1946 â€“ October 6, 2019) was an American child television actress. She was the original Mickey Mouse Club Mouseketeer on ABC television from 1955 to 1959. She was one of only nine Mouseketeers who were on the show during its entire original run. Pendleton was born in Glendale, California. Pendleton died in Fresno, California on October 6, 2019 from a heart attack at the age of 73. ==References== ==Other websites== *Karen Pendleton at Original MMC Show * Category:1946 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:American child actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Glendale, California
title: Karen Pendleton
